reviews.author: Bella Peregrino

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for the feedback, Bella. Im sorry to hear that you have had difficulty with the parking lot here. Our goal is to always provide as much parking as possible for our residents in our reserved parking lot and make sure that only  More

reviews.author: Sonja Hinshaw
reviews.review: I really wanted to like this place but unfortunately its just not what it claims to be. The building itself is pretty nice, you can tell it was made to look good but not actually be of good quality but I can get over that. My main issue I

ownerResponse.text:
Hi Sonja,
Thanks for taking the time to give some feed back. I am sorry to hear you are not satisfied with the property. Regarding management, we have an onsite manager  More

reviews.author: Wala Saadeh
reviews.review: New and spacious apartments with excellent finishes. The entry to building is secured which is very safe and relaxing. Balcony view is amazing and I personally love it so much. The property manager is very responsive to questions and concerns. Highly recommended!

reviews.author: Jane Bekker
reviews.review: Disappointed in the management and overall experience living here. There have been many issues with this place from the beginning. To name a few, the move in date was pushed back two days and we were given less than a days notice, the

ownerResponse.text:
Hi Jane, 
I'm sorry to hear about your disappointment with some issues since you moved in. There were some tight construction deadlines, so we apologize if anything was  More

reviews.author: Lauren Wright
reviews.review: Nice apartments but poor management as far as wait times, parking, and construction goes. This place was supposed to be finished in May 2022 and is still not finished. Its a sunny afternoon and I have my window shut because of all the

ownerResponse.text: We're sorry to hear this about your experience here. We strive to make our residents happy, and we apologize for the disruptions and noise caused by construction at the property. Our management team has addressed these noise issues with the  More

reviews.author: Kimberly Fine
reviews.review: Beautiful apartments with modern finishes. The property manager is very responsive to questions and concerns. Having secure entry to the building makes it feel super safe and the package parcels are a great bonus!

reviews.author: Richard Dickson
reviews.review: When I moved in I was warned by other residents that this building is not safe, I didn't believe them but i should have. I have lived here for just over 3 weeks and I have already heard of 2 of my neighbors being robbed because the doors do not use real locks, instead opting for keypads that malfunction half the time you use them.

ownerResponse.text: We are sorry to hear that there have been crime issues here. We are always working towards creating a safer place to live for our tenants. Thank you for your patience as we worked through any issues that came up in our opening days with the  More

reviews.author: Muhammad Awais Bin Altaf
reviews.review: Great place and nice location. Living here with my family and absolutely enjoying it. Highly recommended. Maintenance just an email away from you. Management is Highly responsive and accommodating.

ownerResponse.text: Glad you enjoy the apartment! Thanks for the feedback.

reviews.author: Alex
reviews.review: 0 stars. I would like this apartment but the horrible management is unacceptable, feel free to park in any spot though, as they do not fine you unless you live here.

ownerResponse.text: We apologize for the tight parking situation. We understand it is frustrating when your parking space is parked in by another person. We are working to create a working parking situation for all tenants. Please let us know if you have further parking issues so we can have the vehicle removed.
Hello Stillo!  Thank you for your review!  We're glad you like it here!

Hello Marcus, thanks for taking the time to review us.  It sounds like we could have done something to better accommodate you.  Please reach out to us to tell us how we can improve our service.  Thank you!
Hello Andrew!  Thank you for the review!
